title: Dexter
overview: Dexter is a thrilling crime drama about Dexter Morgan, a Miami blood spatter analyst with a dark secret: he’s also a serial killer who targets criminals who slip through the justice system. By day, Dexter helps solve murders; by night, he follows a strict moral code to eliminate dangerous offenders. Haunted by his past and guided by his adoptive father’s rules, Dexter struggles to balance his double life while maintaining relationships with his sister, friends, and colleagues. As the police investigate a string of killings, Dexter must evade suspicion and confront his own inner demons. This intense story blends suspense, dark humor, and ethical dilemmas, making viewers question what it means to be good or evil.
